name: Owl Multiplayer
description:
Great Horned Owl Multiplayer

Many of our biggest and most dedicated fans have asked us to create an Owl Multiplayer game. Owl, who doesn't love them? Huge birds that can turn their heads nearly all the way around. Its the same ultra massive map we used in Eagle Multiplayer. Its our largest and most ambitious map yet. So large, we had to include warp zones. Fly and dive your customizable eagle. Hunt down prey including bears, mice, deer. Too many enemy animals to name. Enemies include Bats, Bears, Owls, Parrots, Crows, Pigeons, Seagulls, People, Knights. Yup! Thats right, you get fly down and attack city dwellers. A section of the map includes a viking village. Zoom your way to victory in this high quality animal simulator. Avoid total chaos and come out as the ultimate Eagle.

Customize your Owl with multiple color options. Feather combinations include Colored, Black, and Blue. Bird Multiplayer in full 3D!

Both online and offline versions available. When all the magic items are collected, the giant bosses will appear.


TOP APP FEATURES INCLUDING:

-- Control your very own Great Horned Owl!!
-- PVP tournament style multiplayer mode
-- Ultra Realistic Weather Simulation - real weather with highly realistic lightning and thunder effects
-- Real-Time Online and Offline 3D Bird Simulator
-- Huge 3D Open World Map - and I mean HUUUGE!!
-- 4 Magic Skills -Invincibility, Fireball, Ice, Electricity, and
-- Loaded with enemies like Bears, Dove, Knights, Cats, Parrots, Owls, Pigeon, Seagull, Mice, and Dragons
-- Includes Online Chat!!
Find all the magic items in the offline map in order to craft your magic. Upgrade your animal speed, strength, and stamina. Use your magic skills selectively against your foes.

Visit the Wildfoot Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames for cool updates and new releases.  We concentrate on making high quality, 3D animal simulators. If you like this bird multiplayer game or have any other ideas, please let us know about it. Have a Wildfoot day and thanks for playing!
